name: MYC_CONVO_ABT_CUST_SVC
description: Customer service topics associated with the MyChart message conversation.

columns.name: THREAD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the thread record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NCS_TOPIC_C_NAME
columns.description: Contains the category value of the customer service topic associated with the conversation

columns.name: TOPIC_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: Contains the name of the customer service topic that was presented to the user that started the conversation. Note that not all customer service topics are presented to the user. Some contexts are hard-coded by the workflow that generates the message.
